Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Pendant
Description: This pendant represents a bunch of grapes, the fruits being carved in relief. The reverse side is flat. It bears a suspension hole in the uppermost section. It most likely was comprised in the decoration motif of one of the many necklaces found in the small New Kingdom sanctuary dedicated to Hathor in the fortress at Mirgissa/Iken.
